entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 10:30 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: E 35 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening then northeast 30 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late in the morning and in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 14 except minus 10 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Flurries along parts of the coast late in the evening and overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 14 except minus 10 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 February 2023
